tool_description: Generates responsive layout code using CSS Grid, Flexbox, or CSS frameworks with breakpoints and container configurations.

layout_type.description: Layout system: flexbox, grid, bootstrap, tailwind

container_type.description: Container type: header, sidebar, main, footer, card, modal, grid-item

columns.description: Number of columns for grid layouts (1-12)

alignment.description: Content alignment: start, center, end, stretch, space-between, space-around

responsive_behavior.description: How layout adapts: stack, wrap, hide, reorder

error_messages: Invalid layout type: Use one of [flexbox, grid, bootstrap, tailwind].
Invalid container type: Use one of [header, sidebar, main, footer, card, modal, grid-item].
Invalid columns value: Columns must be between 1 and 12.
Invalid alignment: Use one of [start, center, end, stretch, space-between, space-around].
Invalid responsive behavior: Use one of [stack, wrap, hide, reorder].
Invalid CSS unit: Provide valid CSS units for gap, max_width, padding, and margin.
Too many breakpoints: Maximum 6 breakpoints allowed.
usage: Specify layout_type, container_type, and breakpoints array. Optionally configure columns, gap, alignment, responsive_behavior, max_width, padding, and margin for detailed layout control.

layout_css.description: Generated CSS code for the layout

html_structure.description: Recommended HTML structure for the layout

responsive_rules.description: List of responsive CSS rules generated

framework_classes.description: Framework-specific CSS classes if using Bootstrap or Tailwind
